practiceSession.title: Team Practice
practiceSession.description: Regular team practice focusing on offensive plays
practiceSession.objectives:
1. Power play formations
2. Offensive zone entries
3. Shooting drills

drills.name: Power Play Setup
drills.description: Practice power play formations and movements

drills.name: 3v3 Scrimmage
drills.description: Small area games focusing on quick decisions

skillsSession.title: Defensive Skills Training
skillsSession.description: Focus on defensive positioning and gap control
skillsSession.objectives:
1. Gap control
2. Stick positioning
3. Transition play

meetingSession.title: Video Review Session
meetingSession.description: Review last game footage and discuss improvements
meetingSession.objectives:
1. Analyze defensive breakdowns
2. Review successful plays
3. Set goals for next game
